article:
The Options => Settings action allows to edit the configuration of the tool.
The configuration of the tool has the following settings:
"Include Individuals": checked if individuals must be included in the result
"Show Relation Constraints": checked if cardinality constraints must be presented on data objects relations
"Show DataProperties types": checked if the types of DataProperties must be presented
"Add Thing Class": checked if the the Thing class should be present
"Width Padding" : the padding for the boxes widths
"Height Padding" : the padding for the boxes height
